#COVID19 #vaccines Pros/Cons

J&J got a one-dose #vaccine and the PREP Act protect companies like #Pfizer and #Moderna from liability if something unintentionally goes wrong. 

Lawyers tell CNBC "there is basically no one to blame in a U.S. court of law" 😇
